common.loadingError: There was a problem loading this content.

competition.signedUp: You have signed up for this competition as ${participant_name}.
competition.stillOpen: This competition is still accepting signups.

compo.logInToAddEntries: Log in to add or edit entries.
compo.votingIsOpenNotLoggedIn: Voting is open! Log in to vote.

compos.empty: No compos going on right now.
compos.title: Compos

dashboard.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. To vote or participate in events, log in at the main Instanssi site first.

programme.empty: Nothing going on at the moment.
programme.title: Programme

dashboard.welcome: Welcome to Kompomaatti, the official compo management system of Instanssi.org!

creator.help: Name to use for the author or group of authors.
creator.title: Author

description.help: Description of the entry, techniques used, excuses, etc.
description.title: Description

disqualified.help: Entry disqualified for rule violation or technical issues.
disqualified.title: Disqualified

imagefile_original.help: Image to use for the entry. Not required, but recommended. Allowed formats: ${imageFormats}.
imagefile_original.title: Image

sourcefile.help: File containing source code or other material. Allowed formats: ${sourceFormats}.
sourcefile.title: Source file

youtube_url.help: Link to a YouTube video of the entry.
youtube_url.title: YouTube URL

voting.atLeastOneRequired: Move at least one entry above the bar to continue.
voting.divider: Arrange entries above this bar to give them points. Entries below are ignored.
voting.hasChanges: Don't forget to save. You can change your votes at any time before the voting deadline.
voting.help2: Entries moved above the bar will receive points according to their order.

voteCode.hasCodeForEvent: You have a valid vote code for this event.
voteCode.help: To vote in Kompomaatti, your account must have a vote code for the event. If you bought a ticket online, you can use the ticket's code for this.
voteCode.noTicketCode: I don't have a ticket code
voteCode.requestPendingHelp: If nothing happens for a while, try poking the people at the infodesk.
voteCode.requestRejectedHelp: Your vote code request has been rejected.
voteCode.title: Vote code
